recordTypes.name: Gas Fitter Permit
recordTypes.description: This permit is required when natural gas/propane gas piping is installed, altered, added to or repaired, including the installation of gas fired appliances. You must be a licensed professional to apply for this permit.

recordTypes.name: Electrical Permit
recordTypes.description: This permit is required when installing any electrical wiring, electrical appliances, electrical services, etc.  Also includes low voltage wiring including cable TV, internet, phones, security alarm systems, etc. You must be a licensed professional to apply for this permit.

recordTypes.name: Plumbing Permit
recordTypes.description: This permit is required anytime the building’s plumbing is being installed, altered, removed, replaced or repaired.  You must be a licensed professional to apply for this permit.

recordTypes.name: Application for Hearing with Zoning Board of Appeals
Conservation Commisson Submittals
recordTypes.description:
This form is to be used for submittals of MassDEP forms. Please note: if using eDEP online, please print the form and upload it to this application.

NOTE: The Massachusetts Wetlands Protection Act (WPA) requires a paper copy in order to comply with  10.05(3)(a) for Requests for Determination of Applicability and 10.05(4)(a) for Notices of Intent and for Abbreviated Notice of Resource Area Delineation which instructs applicants to submit these applications by certified mail or hand delivery to the conservation commission.

recordTypes.name: Annual Common Victualer/Food Establishment Permits
recordTypes.description: This form contains the Common Victualer and Food Establishment permits all on one form.

recordTypes.name: Application for License to Operate a Recreational Camp for Children
Annual Liquor License Establishment Permits
recordTypes.description: This form contains the Liquor License, Food Establishment and Annual Certificate of Inspection permits all on one form.   Please note: If you have a Sunday License, You will still need to send in an additional separate $100.00 check for the state.

recordTypes.name: Application to Operate an Indoor Ice Rink
1-2 Family - Doors/Roofing/Siding/Windows and Insulation Permit
recordTypes.description: This application is intended for minor repairs and the replacement of roofing, siding, windows, doors, insulation, steps, and similar components for 1-2 family buildings.

recordTypes.name: Annual Certificate of Inspection
recordTypes.description: This is only for annual commercial building inspections. For rental dwelling unit inspections, please see the Board of Health permits.

recordTypes.name: Liquor License/Food Establishment Permit
recordTypes.description: This form contains the Liquor License and Food Establishment permits all on one form.   Please note: If you have a Sunday License, You will still need to send in an additional separate $100.00 check for the state.

recordTypes.name: Application for a Disposal System Construction Permit
recordTypes.description: For construction, repair, upgrade and abandonment of Septic Systems.

recordTypes.name: Package Store Application
recordTypes.description: This form is for a package store ONLY. No other licenses are included on this form.

recordTypes.name: Seasonal Liquor License Establishment Permits
recordTypes.description: This form contains the Seasonal Liquor License  Annual Certificate of Inspection permits all on one form.

recordTypes.name: Application for Title 5 Inspection or Soil Evaluation
recordTypes.description: This application is to request a Title 5 inspection or Soil Evaluation inspection.

recordTypes.name: Commercial Building Permit
recordTypes.description: This application is used for new construction, additions and alterations to commercial properties. Note: Please allow up to 10 (ten) days for Fire Department review prior to issuance of the permit.

recordTypes.name: Body Art Technician Application
recordTypes.description: This permit is needed for both body art technicians and/or body art establishments.

recordTypes.name: Commercial Change of Use and/or Occupancy
recordTypes.description: This permit is to be used whenever a change of use and/or occupancy is going to be requested. Note: Please allow up to 10 (ten) days for Fire Department review prior to issuance of the permit.

recordTypes.name: Seasonal Liquor License Permit
recordTypes.description: This form is for the liquor license, common victualer and live music permits only.

recordTypes.name: Chapter 2 Dwelling Unit or Rooming Unit Certification
recordTypes.description: Any apartment or house being rented requires a Certificate of Compliance by the Board of Health.

recordTypes.name: Farmer's Market Prepared Food Permit Application
recordTypes.description: This permit is for processed foods, meat and poultry only. No permit is needed for fresh (uncut) produce, unprocessed honey Raw honey as defined by the National Honey Board: Honey as it exists in the beehive or as obtained by extraction, settling or straining without added heat.), maple syrup, and farm fresh eggs (must be stored and maintained at 45°F (7.2°C)).

recordTypes.name: Deck/Porch Permit
recordTypes.description: This application is used for new, replacement or alteration of a deck or porch.

recordTypes.name: Demolition Permit
recordTypes.description: This application is used for complete demolition of a building and/or accessory building. For partial and interior demolition, use the Interior Demo/Renovation application for 1-2 family buildings or the Commercial Building Permit for any commercial project.

recordTypes.name: Operation of a Manufactured Housing Community Application
Demolition Delay Bylaw - Application for Hearing
Permit to Operate a Food Establishment
recordTypes.description: Permits for Retail Food, Foodservice/Caterer, Residential Kitchen, Bed and Breakfast, Non-profit Organizations, and temporary permits. For a Farmer's Market permit, please see the Farmer's Market Prepared Food Permit Application.

recordTypes.name: Fence Permit
recordTypes.description: This application is used for installing a perimeter fence 7 feet or greater in height. This application is not for pool fences. To put up a residential pool fence please use the 1 & 2 Family Building Permit - Short Form.

recordTypes.name: 1-2 Family - Interior Demolition/Renovation Permit
recordTypes.description: This application is used for interior demolition or renovation of a 1-2 family residence only.

recordTypes.name: Permit to Operate a Swimming Pool, Hot Tub, or Spa Application
Mechanical Permit
recordTypes.description: This permit is required to erect, install, enlarge, alter, do major repairs, remove, convert or replace a mechanical system.  The property owner or owner’s agent can apply for this permit.  This permit is issued by the Building Inspector. Note: Certain permits will require Fire Department review. Please allow up to 10 (ten) days for the Fire Department review prior to issuance of the permit.

recordTypes.name: New 1-2 Family Accessory Building Permit
recordTypes.description: This application is used for new construction of an accessory building 200 square feet and over. This is for tool/garden sheds ONLY.

recordTypes.name: New 1-2 Family Building Permit
recordTypes.description: This application is used for new construction and additions to a 1-2 Family home. Note: Please allow up to 10 (ten) days for Fire Department review prior to issuance of the permit.

recordTypes.name: Pool Permit
recordTypes.description: This application is used for installing an above-ground or in-ground pool.

recordTypes.name: Tobacco Product Sales Permit Application
recordTypes.description: Tobacco Product Sales Permits are limited by the Board of Health and all allowed permits are currently issued. NO ADDITIONAL NEW PERMITS ARE AVAILABLE.

recordTypes.name: Sheet Metal Permit
recordTypes.description: This permit is required when a sheet metal worker is manufacturing, fabricating, assembling, handling, erecting, installing, dismantling, alteration and/or repairing duct work, commercial fans, kitchen hoods and vents, architectural sheet metal and metal roofing.

recordTypes.name: Solar Permit
recordTypes.description: This application is used for the building portion of a solar permit. An electrical permit will still be required.

recordTypes.name: Solid Fuel Appliance Permit
recordTypes.description: This application is used for installation of wood, pellet or coal stoves.

recordTypes.name: Trench Permit
recordTypes.description: This permit is required anytime a trench hole or other excavation is being done to a depth of 4 (four) feet or more.  If this application is in connection with a road opening permit, please attach copy of road opening permit.

categories.name: Town Clerk Licenses
categories.content:
Licenses are due by April 1st. Any application received after June 15th will be subject to a $10.00 late fee.


Please note you will need the following to license your dog:

  • Up-to-date rabies certificate
  • Proof of spay/neuter if your dog is being newly licensed with the Town or if your dog is newly spayed/neutered

For detailed instructions on
